translated: Elder’s Birth Stories
The Chapter with Pilindavaccha
The Elder Madhudāyaka’s Birth Story
“On the bank of the Sindhu River,
my hermitage was well-built;
There I taught my disciples,
this history with its characteristics.
They were eager for the Dhamma, well-trained,
eager to hear the good advice;
Having attained perfection in the six abilities,
they lived on the bank of the Sindhu.
In the matter of arising and passing away,
skilled in the characteristics;
Seeking the highest meaning,
they lived in the wilderness then.
The fully awakened one named Sumedha,
appeared in the world at that time;
Out of compassion for us,
the leader came.🔽The great hero,
Sumedha, the leader of the world,
having spread out a mat of grass,
the servant of the world’s elder.

analyzed: vipinātaḥ madhum gayha  buddha seṭṭhaḥ sadā saha
translated: Having brought honey from the wilderness,🔽the servant of the best Buddha,
the fully awakened one having eaten it,
spoke this statement:
‘He who gave me the honey,
faithful with his own hands;
I will praise him,
listen to me as I speak.
By this gift of honey,
And with a spread of grass,
For thirty thousand eons,
He will delight in the heavenly world.

Having come here from the heavenly world,
Entering my mother’s womb,🔽A rain of honey fell,🔽Covering the earth with honey.

analyzed: mayi nikkhanta mattamhi  kucchiyā ca suduttarā
translated: From my mother’s womb,
There too a rain of honey fell,
Constantly raining down.
Having gone forth from the home life🔽Into homelessness,
I received food and drink,
The fruit of giving honey.
Having fulfilled all my desires,
Among gods and humans,
By that very gift of honey,
I attained the destruction of the taints.
When the rain had fallen and the four-inch grass
Had grown and covered the earth with shoots,
In an empty house, under a tree in a park,
I live constantly, happy and free from cankers.
In the middle of the great and the low,
I have transcended all existences;
Today my cankers are destroyed,
there is no more renewed existence for me.
For three thousand eons,
the gift I gave then,
I do not recall any bad destination,
this is the fruit of the honey gift.
My defilements are burned away,
all existences are uprooted;
All cankers are completely destroyed,
there is no more renewed existence for me.
Welcome indeed it was for me,
The Buddha’s instruction has been fulfilled.
The four analytical knowledges,
The Buddha’s instruction has been fulfilled.”
